titleStmt.title: Sir, You are desired to send in your horse & armes required of you by warrant from the Militia of London, to the new artillary-ground, upon Monday next being the nine and twentieth of this instant Iuly, by eight of the clock in the forenoone. Dated this 26 of Iuly 1650. Your reall freind[sic] Jacob Strange.
titleStmt.author: Strange, Jacob.

notesStmt.note: A form sent to George Thomason and Philemon Stevens by the Militia of London.
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "vide 4th June 1650 in ye follio collection.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
